data.title: Contact Us
data.text:
Orange Julius®/Dairy Queen® restaurants are independently owned and operated franchised locations. The independent franchise operators of Orange Julius®/DQ restaurants and their employees, together with American Dairy Queen Corporation (ADQ), strive to provide customers with the best products and service possible. Your feedback is important because it enables Orange Julius®/DQ franchise owners and ADQ to ensure that they maintain high standards of products and service.

If you have comments regarding a particular Orange Julius®/DQ restaurant, please contact the independent franchise operator of that location directly so that they may personally and immediately assist you. Use the Store Locator to obtain the contact information for that restaurant.

You may also use the form on the right to provide feedback to ADQ regarding one of its franchised restaurants, and ADQ will forward your comments directly to the independent franchise operator of that location for you.

To speak with a Fan Relations Specialist (M-F 9a-9p; Sa-Su 10a-6p CST) call toll free:

1-866-793-7582. They can answer any questions you may have and can forward your comments directly to an independent franchise operator for you.
